avi_analyticsprofile.description: Module for setup of AnalyticsProfile Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_analyticsprofile

disable_se_analytics: not required, default: undefined. # Disable node (service engine) level analytics forvs metrics.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

apdex_server_rtt_tolerated_factor: not required, default: undefined. # Tolerated client to avi round trip time(rtt) factor.,It is a multiple of apdex_rtt_tolerated_factor.,Allowed values are 1-1000.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 4.0.

hs_security_tls12_score: not required, default: undefined. # Score assigned when supporting tls1.2 encryption protocol.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 5.0.

exclude_no_dns_record_as_error: not required, default: undefined. # Exclude queries to domains that did not have configured services/records from the list of errors.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

conn_server_lossy_zero_win_size_event_threshold: not required, default: undefined. # A server connection is considered lossy when percentage of times a packet could not be trasmitted due to tcp zero window is above this threshold.,Allowed values are 0-100.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 2.

conn_lossy_total_rexmt_threshold: not required, default: undefined. # A connection between client and avi is considered lossy when more than this percentage of packets are retransmitted.,Allowed values are 1-100.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 50.

hs_pscore_traffic_threshold_l4_client: not required, default: undefined. # Threshold number of connections in 5min, below which apdexr, apdexc, rum_apdex, and other network quality metrics are not computed.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 10.0.

exclude_no_valid_gs_member_as_error: not required, default: undefined. # Exclude queries to gslb services that have no available members from the list of errors.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

hs_security_cipherscore_ge128b: not required, default: undefined. # Score assigned when the minimum cipher strength is greater than equal to 128 bits.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 5.0.
uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Uuid of the analytics profile.

exclude_invalid_dns_domain_as_error: not required, default: undefined. # Exclude dns queries to domains outside the domains configured in the dns application profile from the list of errors.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

exclude_http_error_codes: not required, default: undefined. # List of http status codes to be excluded from being classified as an error.,Error connections or responses impacts health score, are included as significant logs, and may be classified as part of a dos attack.

hs_max_anomaly_penalty: not required, default: undefined. # Maximum penalty that may be deducted from health score for anomalies.,Allowed values are 0-100.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 10.

conn_server_lossy_ooo_threshold: not required, default: undefined. # A connection between avi and server is considered lossy when more than this percentage of out of order packets are received.,Allowed values are 1-100.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 50.

exclude_persistence_change_as_error: not required, default: undefined. # Exclude persistence server changed while load balancing' from the list of errors.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
hs_security_selfsignedcert_penalty: not required, default: undefined. # Deprecated.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.0.

conn_server_lossy_total_rexmt_threshold: not required, default: undefined. # A connection between avi and server is considered lossy when more than this percentage of packets are retransmitted.,Allowed values are 1-100.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 50.
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

hs_security_certscore_le30d: not required, default: undefined. # Score assigned when the certificate expires in less than or equal to 30 days.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 4.0.

exclude_syn_retransmit_as_error: not required, default: undefined. # Exclude 'server unanswered syns' from the list of errors.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).

hs_security_hsts_penalty: not required, default: undefined. # Penalty for not enabling hsts.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.0.

hs_pscore_traffic_threshold_l4_server: not required, default: undefined. # Threshold number of connections in 5min, below which apdexr, apdexc, rum_apdex, and other network quality metrics are not computed.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 10.0.
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).

conn_lossy_zero_win_size_event_threshold: not required, default: undefined. # A client connection is considered lossy when percentage of times a packet could not be trasmitted due to tcp zero window is above this threshold.,Allowed values are 0-100.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 2.

hs_security_encalgo_score_rc4: not required, default: undefined. # Score assigned when rc4 algorithm is used for encryption.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 2.5.
name: required, default: undefined. # The name of the analytics profile.

apdex_rtt_threshold: not required, default: undefined. # Satisfactory client to avi round trip time(rtt).,Allowed values are 1-2000.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 250.
tenant_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type tenant.

apdex_response_tolerated_factor: not required, default: undefined. # Client tolerated response latency factor.,Client must receive a response within this factor times the satisfactory threshold (apdex_response_threshold) to be considered tolerated.,Allowed values are 1-1000.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 4.0.

exclude_tcp_reset_as_error: not required, default: undefined. # Exclude tcp resets by client from the list of potential errors.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

hs_max_security_penalty: not required, default: undefined. # Maximum penalty that may be deducted from health score based on security assessment.,Allowed values are 0-100.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 100.

exclude_invalid_dns_query_as_error: not required, default: undefined. # Exclude invalid dns queries from the list of errors.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

conn_lossy_ooo_threshold: not required, default: undefined. # A connection between client and avi is considered lossy when more than this percentage of out of order packets are received.,Allowed values are 1-100.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 50.

hs_security_cipherscore_lt128b: not required, default: undefined. # Score assigned when the minimum cipher strength is less than 128 bits.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 3.5.
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

hs_event_throttle_window: not required, default: undefined. # Time window (in secs) within which only unique health change events should occur.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1209600.

hs_security_nonpfs_penalty: not required, default: undefined. # Penalty for allowing non-pfs handshakes.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.0.

hs_security_certscore_gt30d: not required, default: undefined. # Score assigned when the certificate expires in more than 30 days.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 5.0.

exclude_server_tcp_reset_as_error: not required, default: undefined. # Exclude server tcp reset from errors.,It is common for applications like ms exchange.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

hs_min_dos_rate: not required, default: undefined. # Dos connection rate below which the dos security assessment will not kick in.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1000.

hs_max_resources_penalty: not required, default: undefined. # Maximum penalty that may be deducted from health score for high resource utilization.,Allowed values are 0-100.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 25.
client_log_streaming_config: not required, default: undefined. # Configure to stream logs to an external server.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.

apdex_server_response_threshold: not required, default: undefined. # A server http response is considered satisfied if latency is less than the satisfactory latency threshold.,The response is considered tolerated when it is greater than satisfied but less than the tolerated latency factor * s_latency.,Greater than this number and the server response is considered frustrated.,Allowed values are 1-30000.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 400.

hs_performance_boost: not required, default: undefined. # Adds free performance score credits to health score.,It can be used for compensating health score for known slow applications.,Allowed values are 0-100.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.

hs_security_ssl30_score: not required, default: undefined. # Score assigned when supporting ssl3.0 encryption protocol.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 3.5.

hs_security_tls11_score: not required, default: undefined. # Score assigned when supporting tls1.1 encryption protocol.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 5.0.

exclude_gs_down_as_error: not required, default: undefined. # Exclude queries to gslb services that are operationally down from the list of errors.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

apdex_server_response_tolerated_factor: not required, default: undefined. # Server tolerated response latency factor.,Servermust response within this factor times the satisfactory threshold (apdex_server_response_threshold) to be considered tolerated.,Allowed values are 1-1000.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 4.0.
state: not required, default: present. # The state that should be applied on the entity.

disable_server_analytics: not required, default: undefined. # Disable analytics on backend servers.,This may be desired in container environment when there are large number of  ephemeral servers.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

conn_server_lossy_timeo_rexmt_threshold: not required, default: undefined. # A connection between avi and server is considered lossy when more than this percentage of packets are retransmitted due to timeout.,Allowed values are 1-100.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 20.

exclude_client_close_before_request_as_error: not required, default: undefined. # Exclude client closed connection before an http request could be completed from being classified as an error.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

hs_security_weak_signature_algo_penalty: not required, default: undefined. # Penalty for allowing weak signature algorithm(s).,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.0.

conn_lossy_timeo_rexmt_threshold: not required, default: undefined. # A connection between client and avi is considered lossy when more than this percentage of packets are retransmitted due to timeout.,Allowed values are 1-100.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 20.
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.

apdex_rtt_tolerated_factor: not required, default: undefined. # Tolerated client to avi round trip time(rtt) factor.,It is a multiple of apdex_rtt_tolerated_factor.,Allowed values are 1-1000.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 4.0.
description: not required, default: undefined. # User defined description for the object.
client_log_config: not required, default: undefined. # Configure which logs are sent to the avi controller from ses and how they are processed.

apdex_rum_tolerated_factor: not required, default: undefined. # Virtual service threshold factor for tolerated page load time (plt) as multiple of apdex_rum_threshold.,Allowed values are 1-1000.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 4.0.

hs_security_cipherscore_eq000b: not required, default: undefined. # Score assigned when the minimum cipher strength is 0 bits.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.0.
ranges: not required, default: undefined. # List of http status code ranges to be excluded from being classified as an error.

apdex_server_rtt_threshold: not required, default: undefined. # Satisfactory client to avi round trip time(rtt).,Allowed values are 1-2000.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 125.

exclude_server_dns_error_as_error: not required, default: undefined. # Exclude server dns error response from the list of errors.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

hs_security_certscore_le07d: not required, default: undefined. # Score assigned when the certificate expires in less than or equal to 7 days.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 2.0.
resp_code_block: not required, default: undefined. # Block of http response codes to be excluded from being classified as an error.,Enum options - AP_HTTP_RSP_4XX, AP_HTTP_RSP_5XX.

hs_security_encalgo_score_none: not required, default: undefined. # Score assigned when no algorithm is used for encryption.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.0.
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

apdex_rum_threshold: not required, default: undefined. # If a client is able to load a page in less than the satisfactory latency threshold, the pageload is considered satisfied.,It is considered tolerated if it is greater than satisfied but less than the tolerated latency multiplied by satisifed latency.,Greater than this number and the client's request is considered frustrated.,A pageload includes the time for dns lookup, download of all http objects, and page render time.,Allowed values are 1-30000.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 5000.

hs_security_chain_invalidity_penalty: not required, default: undefined. # Penalty for allowing certificates with invalid chain.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.0.
url: not required, default: undefined. # Avi controller URL of the object.

hs_security_tls10_score: not required, default: undefined. # Score assigned when supporting tls1.0 encryption protocol.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 5.0.

hs_security_certscore_expired: not required, default: undefined. # Score assigned when the certificate has expired.,Allowed values are 0-5.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.0.

apdex_response_threshold: not required, default: undefined. # If a client receives an http response in less than the satisfactory latency threshold, the request is considered satisfied.,It is considered tolerated if it is not satisfied and less than tolerated latency factor multiplied by the satisfactory latency threshold.,Greater than this number and the client's request is considered frustrated.,Allowed values are 1-30000.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 500.

exclude_unsupported_dns_query_as_error: not required, default: undefined. # Exclude unsupported dns queries from the list of errors.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
avi_api_session
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
http_method: required, default: undefined. # Allowed HTTP methods for RESTful services and are supported by Avi Controller.
params: not required, default: undefined. # Query parameters passed to the HTTP API.
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
timeout: not required, default: undefined. # Timeout (in seconds) for Avi API calls.
path: not required, default: undefined. # Path for Avi API resource. For example, C(path: virtualservice) will translate to C(api/virtualserivce).
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
data: not required, default: undefined. # HTTP body in YAML or JSON format.
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

avi_applicationpersistenceprofile.description: Module for setup of ApplicationPersistenceProfile Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_applicationpersistenceprofile
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
description: not required, default: undefined. # User defined description for the object.

server_hm_down_recovery: not required, default: undefined. # Specifies behavior when a persistent server has been marked down by a health monitor.,Enum options - HM_DOWN_PICK_NEW_SERVER, HM_DOWN_ABORT_CONNECTION, HM_DOWN_CONTINUE_PERSISTENT_SERVER.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as HM_DOWN_PICK_NEW_SERVER.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
ip_persistence_profile: not required, default: undefined. # Specifies the client ip persistence profile parameters.
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
name: required, default: undefined. # A user-friendly name for the persistence profile.
uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Uuid of the persistence profile.
app_cookie_persistence_profile: not required, default: undefined. # Specifies the application cookie persistence profile parameters.

persistence_type: required, default: undefined. # Method used to persist clients to the same server for a duration of time or a session.,Enum options - PERSISTENCE_TYPE_CLIENT_IP_ADDRESS, PERSISTENCE_TYPE_HTTP_COOKIE, PERSISTENCE_TYPE_TLS, PERSISTENCE_TYPE_CLIENT_IPV6_ADDRESS,,PERSISTENCE_TYPE_CUSTOM_HTTP_HEADER, PERSISTENCE_TYPE_APP_COOKIE, PERSISTENCE_TYPE_GSLB_SITE.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as PERSISTENCE_TYPE_CLIENT_IP_ADDRESS.
tenant_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type tenant.

is_federated: not required, default: undefined. # This field describes the object's replication scope.,If the field is set to false, then the object is visible within the controller-cluster and its associated service-engines.,If the field is set to true, then the object is replicated across the federation.,Field introduced in 17.1.3.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
http_cookie_persistence_profile: not required, default: undefined. # Specifies the http cookie persistence profile parameters.
url: not required, default: undefined. # Avi controller URL of the object.
state: not required, default: present. # The state that should be applied on the entity.
hdr_persistence_profile: not required, default: undefined. # Specifies the custom http header persistence profile parameters.
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.

avi_applicationprofile.description: Module for setup of ApplicationProfile Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_applicationprofile
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
description: not required, default: undefined. # User defined description for the object.
http_profile: not required, default: undefined. # Specifies the http application proxy profile parameters.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
dos_rl_profile: not required, default: undefined. # Specifies various security related controls for virtual service.
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).

avi_cloud.description: Module for setup of Cloud Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_cloud
vca_configuration: not required, default: undefined. # Vcloudairconfiguration settings for cloud.
proxy_configuration: not required, default: undefined. # Proxyconfiguration settings for cloud.
docker_configuration: not required, default: undefined. # Dockerconfiguration settings for cloud.
oshiftk8s_configuration: not required, default: undefined. # Oshiftk8sconfiguration settings for cloud.
mtu: not required, default: undefined. # Mtu setting for the cloud.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1500.
rancher_configuration: not required, default: undefined. # Rancherconfiguration settings for cloud.

vtype: required, default: undefined. # Cloud type.,Enum options - CLOUD_NONE, CLOUD_VCENTER, CLOUD_OPENSTACK, CLOUD_AWS, CLOUD_VCA, CLOUD_APIC, CLOUD_MESOS, CLOUD_LINUXSERVER, CLOUD_DOCKER_UCP,,CLOUD_RANCHER, CLOUD_OSHIFT_K8S.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as CLOUD_NONE.
uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Unique object identifier of the object.
linuxserver_configuration: not required, default: undefined. # Linuxserverconfiguration settings for cloud.
nsx_configuration: not required, default: undefined. # Configuration parameters for nsx manager.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.
state: not required, default: present. # The state that should be applied on the entity.
apic_mode: not required, default: undefined. # Boolean flag to set apic_mode.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
dns_provider_ref: not required, default: undefined. # Dns profile for the cloud.,It is a reference to an object of type ipamdnsproviderprofile.

username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
mesos_configuration: not required, default: undefined. # Mesosconfiguration settings for cloud.
openstack_configuration: not required, default: undefined. # Openstackconfiguration settings for cloud.

enable_vip_static_routes: not required, default: undefined. # Use static routes for vip side network resolution during virtualservice placement.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
aws_configuration: not required, default: undefined. # Awsconfiguration settings for cloud.
cloudstack_configuration: not required, default: undefined. # Cloudstackconfiguration settings for cloud.
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
ipam_provider_ref: not required, default: undefined. # Ipam profile for the cloud.,It is a reference to an object of type ipamdnsproviderprofile.
name: required, default: undefined. # Name of the object.
url: not required, default: undefined. # Avi controller URL of the object.
tenant_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
dhcp_enabled: not required, default: undefined. # Select the ip address management scheme.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

east_west_ipam_provider_ref: not required, default: undefined. # Ipam profile for east-west services.,Warning - please use virtual subnets in this ipam profile that do not conflict with the underlay networks or any overlay networks in the cluster.,For example in aws and gcp, 169.254.0.0/16 is used for storing instance metadata.,Hence, it should not be used in this profile.,It is a reference to an object of type ipamdnsproviderprofile.
obj_name_prefix: not required, default: undefined. # Default prefix for all automatically created objects in this cloud.,This prefix can be overridden by the se-group template.
apic_configuration: not required, default: undefined. # Apicconfiguration settings for cloud.

prefer_static_routes: not required, default: undefined. # Prefer static routes over interface routes during virtualservice placement.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

license_type: not required, default: undefined. # If no license type is specified then default license enforcement for the cloud type is chosen.,The default mappings are container cloud is max ses, openstack and vmware is cores and linux it is sockets.,Enum options - LIC_BACKEND_SERVERS, LIC_SOCKETS, LIC_CORES, LIC_HOSTS.

tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
east_west_dns_provider_ref: not required, default: undefined. # Dns profile for east-west services.,It is a reference to an object of type ipamdnsproviderprofile.

seupgrade_segroup_min_dead_timeout: not required, default: undefined. # Time to wait before marking segroup upgrade as stuck.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 360.

max_dead_se_in_grp: not required, default: undefined. # Number of max_dead_se_in_grp.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.

clear_on_max_retries: not required, default: undefined. # Max retries after which the remote site is treatedas a fresh start.,In fresh start all the configsare downloaded.,Allowed values are 1-1024.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 20.
state: not required, default: present. # The state that should be applied on the entity.

send_interval: not required, default: undefined. # Frequency with which group members communicate.,Allowed values are 1-3600.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 15.
client_ip_addr_group: not required, default: undefined. # Group to specify if the client ip addresses are public or private.,Field introduced in 17.1.2.
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.

avi_gslbhealthmonitor.description: Module for setup of GslbHealthMonitor Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_gslbhealthmonitor
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
https_monitor: not required, default: undefined. # Healthmonitorhttp settings for gslbhealthmonitor.

receive_timeout: not required, default: undefined. # A valid response from the server is expected within the receive timeout window.,This timeout must be less than the send interval.,If server status is regularly flapping up and down, consider increasing this value.,Allowed values are 1-300.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 4.
description: not required, default: undefined. # User defined description for the object.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
udp_monitor: not required, default: undefined. # Healthmonitorudp settings for gslbhealthmonitor.
http_monitor: not required, default: undefined. # Healthmonitorhttp settings for gslbhealthmonitor.
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

successful_checks: not required, default: undefined. # Number of continuous successful health checks before server is marked up.,Allowed values are 1-50.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 2.

monitor_port: not required, default: undefined. # Use this port instead of the port defined for the server in the pool.,If the monitor succeeds to this port, the load balanced traffic will still be sent to the port of the server defined within the pool.,Allowed values are 1-65535.,Special values are 0 - 'use server port'.
uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Uuid of the health monitor.
url: not required, default: undefined. # Avi controller URL of the object.
dns_monitor: not required, default: undefined. # Healthmonitordns settings for gslbhealthmonitor.
tenant_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
name: required, default: undefined. # A user friendly name for this health monitor.

failed_checks: not required, default: undefined. # Number of continuous failed health checks before the server is marked down.,Allowed values are 1-50.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 2.
tcp_monitor: not required, default: undefined. # Healthmonitortcp settings for gslbhealthmonitor.
state: not required, default: present. # The state that should be applied on the entity.

send_interval: not required, default: undefined. # Frequency, in seconds, that monitors are sent to a server.,Allowed values are 1-3600.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 5.
external_monitor: not required, default: undefined. # Healthmonitorexternal settings for gslbhealthmonitor.

type: required, default: undefined. # Type of the health monitor.,Enum options - HEALTH_MONITOR_PING, HEALTH_MONITOR_TCP, HEALTH_MONITOR_HTTP, HEALTH_MONITOR_HTTPS, HEALTH_MONITOR_EXTERNAL, HEALTH_MONITOR_UDP,,HEALTH_MONITOR_DNS, HEALTH_MONITOR_GSLB.
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.

avi_gslbservice.description: Module for setup of GslbService Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_gslbservice
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
description: not required, default: undefined. # User defined description for the object.

wildcard_match: not required, default: undefined. # Enable wild-card match of fqdn  if an exact match is not found in the dns table, the longest match is chosen by wild-carding the fqdn in the dns,request.,Default is false.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

enabled: not required, default: undefined. # Enable or disable the gslb service.,If the gslb service is enabled, then the vips are sent in the dns responses based on reachability and configured algorithm.,If the gslb service is disabled, then the vips are no longer available in the dns response.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.
domain_names: not required, default: undefined. # Fully qualified domain name of the gslb service.

is_federated: not required, default: undefined. # This field indicates that this object is replicated across gslb federation.,Field introduced in 17.1.3.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
groups: not required, default: undefined. # Select list of pools belonging to this gslb service.
ttl: not required, default: undefined. # Ttl value (in seconds) for records served for this gslb service by the dns service.,Allowed values are 1-86400.
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).

health_monitor_scope: not required, default: undefined. # Health monitor probe can be executed for all the members or it can be executed only for third-party members.,This operational mode is useful to reduce the number of health monitor probes in case of a hybrid scenario.,In such a case, avi members can have controller derived status while non-avi members can be probed by via health monitor probes in dataplane.,Enum options - GSLB_SERVICE_HEALTH_MONITOR_ALL_MEMBERS, GSLB_SERVICE_HEALTH_MONITOR_ONLY_NON_AVI_MEMBERS.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as GSLB_SERVICE_HEALTH_MONITOR_ALL_MEMBERS.
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Uuid of the gslb service.

controller_health_status_enabled: not required, default: undefined. # Gs member's overall health status is derived based on a combination of controller and datapath health-status inputs.,Note that the datapath status is determined by the association of health monitor profiles.,Only the controller provided status is determined through this configuration.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.
name: required, default: undefined. # Name for the gslb service.
url: not required, default: undefined. # Avi controller URL of the object.
down_response: not required, default: undefined. # Response to the client query when the gslb service is down.
tenant_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type tenant.

use_edns_client_subnet: not required, default: undefined. # Use the client ip subnet from the edns option as source ipaddress for client geo-location and consistent hash algorithm.,Default is true.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.
created_by: not required, default: undefined. # Creator name.,Field introduced in 17.1.2.

health_monitor_refs: not required, default: undefined. # Verify vs health by applying one or more health monitors.,Active monitors generate synthetic traffic from dns service engine and to mark a vs up or down based on the response.,It is a reference to an object of type healthmonitor.
state: not required, default: present. # The state that should be applied on the entity.

num_dns_ip: not required, default: undefined. # Number of ip addresses of this gslb service to be returned by the dns service.,Enter 0 to return all ip addresses.,Allowed values are 1-20.,Special values are 0- 'return all ip addresses'.
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.

cloud_config_cksum: not required, default: undefined. # Checksum of cloud configuration for network sec policy.,Internally set by cloud connector.
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
name: not required, default: undefined. # Name of the object.

avi_pkiprofile.description: Module for setup of PKIProfile Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_pkiprofile
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
crls: not required, default: undefined. # Certificate revocation lists.

ignore_peer_chain: not required, default: undefined. # When enabled, avi will not trust intermediate and root certs presented by a client.,Instead, only the chain certs configured in the certificate authority section will be used to verify trust of the client's cert.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

validate_only_leaf_crl: not required, default: undefined. # When enabled, avi will only validate the revocation status of the leaf certificate using crl.,To enable validation for the entire chain, disable this option and provide all the relevant crls.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Unique object identifier of the object.
name: required, default: undefined. # Name of the pki profile.
url: not required, default: undefined. # Avi controller URL of the object.
tenant_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type tenant.

is_federated: not required, default: undefined. # This field describes the object's replication scope.,If the field is set to false, then the object is visible within the controller-cluster and its associated service-engines.,If the field is set to true, then the object is replicated across the federation.,Field introduced in 17.1.3.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
created_by: not required, default: undefined. # Creator name.
state: not required, default: present. # The state that should be applied on the entity.
ca_certs: not required, default: undefined. # List of certificate authorities (root and intermediate) trusted that is used for certificate validation.

crl_check: not required, default: undefined. # When enabled, avi will verify via crl checks that certificates in the trust chain have not been revoked.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.

avi_pool.description: Module for setup of Pool Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_pool

lb_algorithm: not required, default: undefined. # The load balancing algorithm will pick a server within the pool's list of available servers.,Enum options - LB_ALGORITHM_LEAST_CONNECTIONS, LB_ALGORITHM_ROUND_ROBIN, LB_ALGORITHM_FASTEST_RESPONSE, LB_ALGORITHM_CONSISTENT_HASH,,LB_ALGORITHM_LEAST_LOAD, LB_ALGORITHM_FEWEST_SERVERS, LB_ALGORITHM_RANDOM, LB_ALGORITHM_FEWEST_TASKS, LB_ALGORITHM_NEAREST_SERVER,,LB_ALGORITHM_CORE_AFFINITY.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as LB_ALGORITHM_LEAST_CONNECTIONS.

use_service_port: not required, default: undefined. # Do not translate the client's destination port when sending the connection to the server.,The pool or servers specified service port will still be used for health monitoring.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

rewrite_host_header_to_server_name: not required, default: undefined. # Rewrite incoming host header to server name of the server to which the request is proxied.,Enabling this feature rewrites host header for requests to all servers in the pool.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

host_check_enabled: not required, default: undefined. # Enable common name check for server certificate.,If enabled and no explicit domain name is specified, avi will use the incoming host header to do the match.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
tenant_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type tenant.

rewrite_host_header_to_sni: not required, default: undefined. # If sni server name is specified, rewrite incoming host header to the sni server name.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
capacity_estimation: not required, default: undefined. # Inline estimation of capacity of servers.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
max_conn_rate_per_server: not required, default: undefined. # Rate limit connections to each server.

servers: not required, default: undefined. # The pool directs load balanced traffic to this list of destination servers.,The servers can be configured by ip address, name, network or via ip address group.

fewest_tasks_feedback_delay: not required, default: undefined. # Periodicity of feedback for fewest tasks server selection algorithm.,Allowed values are 1-300.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 10.
server_auto_scale: not required, default: undefined. # Server autoscale.,Not used anymore.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
east_west: not required, default: undefined. # Inherited config from virtualservice.
ab_pool: not required, default: undefined. # A/b pool configuration.

capacity_estimation_ttfb_thresh: not required, default: undefined. # The maximum time-to-first-byte of a server.,Allowed values are 1-5000.,Special values are 0 - 'automatic'.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.

fail_action: not required, default: undefined. # Enable an action - close connection, http redirect or local http response - when a pool failure happens.,By default, a connection will be closed, in case the pool experiences a failure.

placement_networks: not required, default: undefined. # Manually select the networks and subnets used to provide reachability to the pool's servers.,Specify the subnet using the following syntax  10-1-1-0/24.,Use static routes in vrf configuration when pool servers are not directly connected butroutable from the service engine.

networks: not required, default: undefined. # (internal-use) networks designated as containing servers for this pool.,The servers may be further narrowed down by a filter.,This field is used internally by avi, not editable by the user.

lb_algorithm_hash: not required, default: undefined. # Criteria used as a key for determining the hash between the client and  server.,Enum options - LB_ALGORITHM_CONSISTENT_HASH_SOURCE_IP_ADDRESS, LB_ALGORITHM_CONSISTENT_HASH_SOURCE_IP_ADDRESS_AND_PORT,,LB_ALGORITHM_CONSISTENT_HASH_URI, LB_ALGORITHM_CONSISTENT_HASH_CUSTOM_HEADER.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as LB_ALGORITHM_CONSISTENT_HASH_SOURCE_IP_ADDRESS.

sni_enabled: not required, default: undefined. # Enable tls sni for server connections.,If disabled, avi will not send the sni extension as part of the handshake.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.

server_name: not required, default: undefined. # Fully qualified dns hostname which will be used in the tls sni extension in server connections if sni is enabled.,If no value is specified, avi will use the incoming host header instead.
lb_algorithm_consistent_hash_hdr: not required, default: undefined. # Http header name to be used for the hash key.
cloud_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type cloud.

lb_algorithm_core_nonaffinity: not required, default: undefined. # Degree of non-affinity for core afffinity based server selection.,Allowed values are 1-65535.,Field introduced in 17.1.3.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 2.
autoscale_policy_ref: not required, default: undefined. # Reference to server autoscale policy.,It is a reference to an object of type serverautoscalepolicy.

ssl_profile_ref: not required, default: undefined. # When enabled, avi re-encrypts traffic to the backend servers.,The specific ssl profile defines which ciphers and ssl versions will be supported.,It is a reference to an object of type sslprofile.
ipaddrgroup_ref: not required, default: undefined. # Use list of servers from ip address group.,It is a reference to an object of type ipaddrgroup.
apic_epg_name: not required, default: undefined. # Synchronize cisco apic epg members with pool servers.
server_reselect: not required, default: undefined. # Server reselect configuration for http requests.
state: not required, default: present. # The state that should be applied on the entity.
nsx_securitygroup: not required, default: undefined. # A list of nsx service groups where the servers for the pool are created.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.
a_pool: not required, default: undefined. # Name of container cloud application that constitutes a pool in a a-b pool configuration, if different from vs app.
pki_profile_ref: not required, default: undefined. # Avi will validate the ssl certificate present by a server against the selected pki profile.,It is a reference to an object of type pkiprofile.
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.

vrf_ref: not required, default: undefined. # Virtual routing context that the pool is bound to.,This is used to provide the isolation of the set of networks the pool is attached to.,The pool inherits the virtual routing conext of the virtual service, and this field is used only internally, and is set by pb-transform.,It is a reference to an object of type vrfcontext.
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

application_persistence_profile_ref: not required, default: undefined. # Persistence will ensure the same user sticks to the same server for a desired duration of time.,It is a reference to an object of type applicationpersistenceprofile.

inline_health_monitor: not required, default: undefined. # The passive monitor will monitor client to server connections and requests and adjust traffic load to servers based on successful responses.,This may alter the expected behavior of the lb method, such as round robin.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.

default_server_port: not required, default: undefined. # Traffic sent to servers will use this destination server port unless overridden by the server's specific port attribute.,The ssl checkbox enables avi to server encryption.,Allowed values are 1-65535.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 80.
description: not required, default: undefined. # A description of the pool.

request_queue_depth: not required, default: undefined. # Minimum number of requests to be queued when pool is full.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 128.

graceful_disable_timeout: not required, default: undefined. # Used to gracefully disable a server.,Virtual service waits for the specified time before terminating the existing connections  to the servers that are disabled.,Allowed values are 1-60.,Special values are 0 - 'immediate', -1 - 'infinite'.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.

domain_name: not required, default: undefined. # Comma separated list of domain names which will be used to verify the common names or subject alternative names presented by server certificates.,It is performed only when common name check host_check_enabled is enabled.
ab_priority: not required, default: undefined. # Priority of this pool in a a-b pool pair.,Internally used.

connection_ramp_duration: not required, default: undefined. # Duration for which new connections will be gradually ramped up to a server recently brought online.,Useful for lb algorithms that are least connection based.,Allowed values are 1-300.,Special values are 0 - 'immediate'.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 10.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
server_count: not required, default: undefined. # Number of server_count.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Uuid of the pool.
request_queue_enabled: not required, default: undefined. # Enable request queue when pool is full.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
name: required, default: undefined. # The name of the pool.

max_concurrent_connections_per_server: not required, default: undefined. # The maximum number of concurrent connections allowed to each server within the pool.,Note  applied value will be no less than the number of service engines that the pool is placed on.,If set to 0, no limit is applied.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.
url: not required, default: undefined. # Avi controller URL of the object.

autoscale_launch_config_ref: not required, default: undefined. # If configured then avi will trigger orchestration of pool server creation and deletion.,It is only supported for container clouds like mesos, opensift, kubernates, docker etc.,It is a reference to an object of type autoscalelaunchconfig.

enabled: not required, default: undefined. # Enable or disable the pool.,Disabling will terminate all open connections and pause health monitors.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.
autoscale_networks: not required, default: undefined. # Network ids for the launch configuration.

health_monitor_refs: not required, default: undefined. # Verify server health by applying one or more health monitors.,Active monitors generate synthetic traffic from each service engine and mark a server up or down based on the response.,The passive monitor listens only to client to server communication.,It raises or lowers the ratio of traffic destined to a server based on successful responses.,It is a reference to an object of type healthmonitor.
ssl_key_and_certificate_ref: not required, default: undefined. # Service engines will present a client ssl certificate to the server.,It is a reference to an object of type sslkeyandcertificate.
cloud_config_cksum: not required, default: undefined. # Checksum of cloud configuration for pool.,Internally set by cloud connector.
external_autoscale_groups: not required, default: undefined. # Names of external auto-scale groups for pool servers.,Currently available only for aws.,Field introduced in 17.1.2.
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
created_by: not required, default: undefined. # Creator name.
prst_hdr_name: not required, default: undefined. # Header name for custom header persistence.

avi_poolgroup.description: Module for setup of PoolGroup Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_poolgroup
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
description: not required, default: undefined. # Description of pool group.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
members: not required, default: undefined. # List of pool group members object of type poolgroupmember.

fail_action: not required, default: undefined. # Enable an action - close connection, http redirect, or local http response - when a pool group failure happens.,By default, a connection will be closed, in case the pool group experiences a failure.
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Uuid of the pool group.

priority_labels_ref: not required, default: undefined. # Uuid of the priority labels.,If not provided, pool group member priority label will be interpreted as a number with a larger number considered higher priority.,It is a reference to an object of type prioritylabels.
name: required, default: undefined. # The name of the pool group.
cloud_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type cloud.
tenant_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
created_by: not required, default: undefined. # Name of the user who created the object.

deployment_policy_ref: not required, default: undefined. # When setup autoscale manager will automatically promote new pools into production when deployment goals are met.,It is a reference to an object of type poolgroupdeploymentpolicy.
url: not required, default: undefined. # Avi controller URL of the object.
state: not required, default: present. # The state that should be applied on the entity.
cloud_config_cksum: not required, default: undefined. # Checksum of cloud configuration for poolgroup.,Internally set by cloud connector.

min_servers: not required, default: undefined. # The minimum number of servers to distribute traffic to.,Allowed values are 1-65535.,Special values are 0 - 'disable'.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.

avi_poolgroupdeploymentpolicy.description: Module for setup of PoolGroupDeploymentPolicy Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_poolgroupdeploymentpolicy
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

target_test_traffic_ratio: not required, default: undefined. # Target traffic ratio before pool is made production.,Allowed values are 1-100.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 100.

evaluation_duration: not required, default: undefined. # Duration of evaluation period for automatic deployment.,Allowed values are 60-86400.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 300.
description: not required, default: undefined. # User defined description for the object.

test_traffic_ratio_rampup: not required, default: undefined. # Ratio of the traffic that is sent to the pool under test.,Test ratio of 100 means blue green.,Allowed values are 1-100.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 100.
rules: not required, default: undefined. # List of pgdeploymentrule.

auto_disable_old_prod_pools: not required, default: undefined. # It will automatically disable old production pools once there is a new production candidate.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).

webhook_ref: not required, default: undefined. # Webhook configured with url that avi controller will pass back information about pool group, old and new pool information and current deployment,rule results.,It is a reference to an object of type webhook.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Uuid of the pool group deployment policy.
name: required, default: undefined. # The name of the pool group deployment policy.
cloud_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type cloud.
tenant_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
url: not required, default: undefined. # Avi controller URL of the object.
state: not required, default: present. # The state that should be applied on the entity.
scheme: not required, default: undefined. # Deployment scheme.,Enum options - BLUE_GREEN, CANARY.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as BLUE_GREEN.
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.

avi_prioritylabels.description: Module for setup of PriorityLabels Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_prioritylabels
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Uuid of the priority labels.
description: not required, default: undefined. # A description of the priority labels.
cloud_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type cloud.
tenant_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
state: not required, default: present. # The state that should be applied on the entity.
url: not required, default: undefined. # Avi controller URL of the object.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
equivalent_labels: not required, default: undefined. # Equivalent priority labels in descending order.
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
name: required, default: undefined. # The name of the priority labels.

avi_role.description: Module for setup of Role Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_role
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Unique object identifier of the object.
url: not required, default: undefined. # Avi controller URL of the object.
privileges: not required, default: undefined. # List of permission.
tenant_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
state: not required, default: present. # The state that should be applied on the entity.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
name: required, default: undefined. # Name of the object.

avi_scheduler.description: Module for setup of Scheduler Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_scheduler
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
tenant_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
backup_config_ref: not required, default: undefined. # Backup configuration to be executed by this scheduler.,It is a reference to an object of type backupconfiguration.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
frequency: not required, default: undefined. # Frequency at which custom scheduler will run.,Allowed values are 0-60.

scheduler_action: not required, default: undefined. # Define scheduler action.,Enum options - SCHEDULER_ACTION_RUN_A_SCRIPT, SCHEDULER_ACTION_BACKUP.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as SCHEDULER_ACTION_BACKUP.
end_date_time: not required, default: undefined. # Scheduler end date and time.
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Unique object identifier of the object.
start_date_time: not required, default: undefined. # Scheduler start date and time.
name: required, default: undefined. # Name of scheduler.
url: not required, default: undefined. # Avi controller URL of the object.
enabled: not required, default: undefined. # Boolean flag to set enabled.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.

frequency_unit: not required, default: undefined. # Unit at which custom scheduler will run.,Enum options - SCHEDULER_FREQUENCY_UNIT_MIN, SCHEDULER_FREQUENCY_UNIT_HOUR, SCHEDULER_FREQUENCY_UNIT_DAY, SCHEDULER_FREQUENCY_UNIT_WEEK,,SCHEDULER_FREQUENCY_UNIT_MONTH.
state: not required, default: present. # The state that should be applied on the entity.
run_script_ref: not required, default: undefined. # Control script to be executed by this scheduler.,It is a reference to an object of type alertscriptconfig.
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
run_mode: not required, default: undefined. # Scheduler run mode.,Enum options - RUN_MODE_PERIODIC, RUN_MODE_AT, RUN_MODE_NOW.

avi_seproperties.description: Module for setup of SeProperties Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_seproperties
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
se_agent_properties: not required, default: undefined. # Seagentproperties settings for seproperties.
uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Unique object identifier of the object.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as default.
url: not required, default: undefined. # Avi controller URL of the object.
se_runtime_properties: not required, default: undefined. # Seruntimeproperties settings for seproperties.
state: not required, default: present. # The state that should be applied on the entity.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
se_bootup_properties: not required, default: undefined. # Sebootupproperties settings for seproperties.
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

avi_serverautoscalepolicy.description: Module for setup of ServerAutoScalePolicy Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_serverautoscalepolicy
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
use_predicted_load: not required, default: undefined. # Use predicted load rather than current load.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

intelligent_autoscale: not required, default: undefined. # Use avi intelligent autoscale algorithm where autoscale is performed by comparing load on the pool against estimated capacity of all the servers.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
description: not required, default: undefined. # User defined description for the object.

intelligent_scaleout_margin: not required, default: undefined. # Minimum extra capacity as percentage of load used by the intelligent scheme.,Scaleout is triggered when available capacity is less than this margin.,Allowed values are 1-99.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 20.
scaleout_alertconfig_refs: not required, default: undefined. # Trigger scaleout when alerts due to any of these alert configurations are raised.,It is a reference to an object of type alertconfig.
min_size: not required, default: undefined. # No scale-in happens once number of operationally up servers reach min_servers.,Allowed values are 0-400.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).

scalein_cooldown: not required, default: undefined. # Cooldown period during which no new scalein is triggered to allow previous scalein to successfully complete.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 300.
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Unique object identifier of the object.

scaleout_cooldown: not required, default: undefined. # Cooldown period during which no new scaleout is triggered to allow previous scaleout to successfully complete.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 300.

intelligent_scalein_margin: not required, default: undefined. # Maximum extra capacity as percentage of load used by the intelligent scheme.,Scalein is triggered when available capacity is more than this margin.,Allowed values are 1-99.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 40.
name: required, default: undefined. # Name of the object.
url: not required, default: undefined. # Avi controller URL of the object.
tenant_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type tenant.

max_scalein_adjustment_step: not required, default: undefined. # Maximum number of servers to scalein simultaneously.,The actual number of servers to scalein is chosen such that target number of servers is always more than or equal to the min_size.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.
state: not required, default: present. # The state that should be applied on the entity.
scalein_alertconfig_refs: not required, default: undefined. # Trigger scalein when alerts due to any of these alert configurations are raised.,It is a reference to an object of type alertconfig.
max_size: not required, default: undefined. # Maximum number of servers after scaleout.,Allowed values are 0-400.

max_scaleout_adjustment_step: not required, default: undefined. # Maximum number of servers to scaleout simultaneously.,The actual number of servers to scaleout is chosen such that target number of servers is always less than or equal to the max_size.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.

avi_serviceengine.description: Module for setup of ServiceEngine Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_serviceengine
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

enable_state: not required, default: undefined. # Inorder to disable se set this field appropriately.,Enum options - SE_STATE_ENABLED, SE_STATE_DISABLED_FOR_PLACEMENT, SE_STATE_DISABLED.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as SE_STATE_ENABLED.
mgmt_vnic: not required, default: undefined. # Vnic settings for serviceengine.
data_vnics: not required, default: undefined. # List of vnic.
controller_created: not required, default: undefined. # Boolean flag to set controller_created.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
flavor: not required, default: undefined. # Flavor of serviceengine.
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
name: not required, default: undefined. # Name of the object.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as VM name unknown.
uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Unique object identifier of the object.
cloud_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type cloud.
hypervisor: not required, default: undefined. # Enum options - default, vmware_esx, kvm, vmware_vsan, xen.
se_group_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type serviceenginegroup.
container_mode: not required, default: undefined. # Boolean flag to set container_mode.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
tenant_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type tenant.

container_type: not required, default: undefined. # Enum options - container_type_bridge, container_type_host, container_type_host_dpdk.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as CONTAINER_TYPE_HOST.
host_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type vimgrhostruntime.
url: not required, default: undefined. # Avi controller URL of the object.
state: not required, default: present. # The state that should be applied on the entity.
resources: not required, default: undefined. # Seresources settings for serviceengine.
availability_zone: not required, default: undefined. # Availability_zone of serviceengine.
controller_ip: not required, default: undefined. # Controller_ip of serviceengine.
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.

avi_serviceenginegroup.description: Module for setup of ServiceEngineGroup Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_serviceenginegroup

floating_intf_ip: not required, default: undefined. # If serviceenginegroup is configured for legacy 1+1 active standby ha mode, floating ip's will be advertised only by the active se in the pair.,Virtual services in this group must be disabled/enabled for any changes to the floating ip's to take effect.,Only active se hosting vs tagged with active standby se 1 tag will advertise this floating ip when manual load distribution is enabled.

host_attribute_value: not required, default: undefined. # Value of a (key, value) pair identifying a label for a set of nodes usually in container clouds.,Needs to be specified together with host_attribute_key.
async_ssl: not required, default: undefined. # Ssl handshakes will be handled by dedicated ssl threads.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
instance_flavor: not required, default: undefined. # Instance/flavor type for se instance.

auto_redistribute_active_standby_load: not required, default: undefined. # Redistribution of virtual services from the takeover se to the replacement se can cause momentary traffic loss.,If the auto-redistribute load option is left in its default off state, any desired rebalancing requires calls to rest api.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

auto_rebalance: not required, default: undefined. # If set, virtual services will be automatically migrated when load on an se is less than minimum or more than maximum thresholds.,Only alerts are generated when the auto_rebalance is not set.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

se_tunnel_mode: not required, default: undefined. # Determines if dsr from secondary se is active or not.,0  automatically determine based on hypervisor type.,1  disable dsr unconditionally.,~[0,1]  enable dsr unconditionally.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.
uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Unique object identifier of the object.

extra_config_multiplier: not required, default: undefined. # Multiplier for extra config to support large vs/pool config.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.0.

se_tunnel_udp_port: not required, default: undefined. # Udp port for tunneled packets from secondary to primary se in docker bridge mode.,Field introduced in 17.1.3.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1550.

vs_scalein_timeout: not required, default: undefined. # Time to wait for the scaled in se to drain existing flows before marking the scalein done.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 30.
mgmt_subnet: not required, default: undefined. # Management subnet to use for avi service engines.

se_remote_punt_udp_port: not required, default: undefined. # Udp port for punted packets in docker bridge mode.,Field introduced in 17.1.2.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1501.

se_udp_encap_ipc: not required, default: undefined. # Determines if se-se ipc messages are encapsulated in an udp header.,0  automatically determine based on hypervisor type.,1  use udp encap unconditionally.,~[0,1]  don't use udp encap.,Field introduced in 17.1.2.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.

min_cpu_usage: not required, default: undefined. # When cpu usage on an se falls below the minimum threshold, virtual services hosted on the se may be consolidated onto other underutilized ses.,After consolidation, unused service engines may then be eligible for deletion.,Allowed values are 20-60.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 30.
