custom_securitygroups_data: not required, default: undefined. # Custom security groups to be associated with data vnics for se instances in openstack and aws clouds.,Field introduced in 17.1.3.
vcenter_clusters: not required, default: undefined. # Vcenterclusters settings for serviceenginegroup.

enable_vip_on_all_interfaces: not required, default: undefined. # Enable vip on all interfaces of se.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.

active_standby: not required, default: undefined. # Service engines in active/standby mode for ha failover.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

max_vs_per_se: not required, default: undefined. # Maximum number of virtual services that can be placed on a single service engine.,East west virtual services are excluded from this limit.,Allowed values are 1-1000.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 10.

connection_memory_percentage: not required, default: undefined. # Percentage of memory for connection state.,This will come at the expense of memory used for http in-memory cache.,Allowed values are 10-90.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 50.
service_ip_subnets: not required, default: undefined. # Subnets assigned to the se group.,Required for vs group placement.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.

placement_mode: not required, default: undefined. # If placement mode is 'auto', virtual services are automatically placed on service engines.,Enum options - PLACEMENT_MODE_AUTO.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as PLACEMENT_MODE_AUTO.

max_scaleout_per_vs: not required, default: undefined. # Maximum number of active service engines for the virtual service.,Allowed values are 1-64.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 4.

os_reserved_memory: not required, default: undefined. # Amount of extra memory to be reserved for use by the operating system on a service engine.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.
enable_routing: not required, default: undefined. # Enable routing for this serviceenginegroup .,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).

per_app: not required, default: undefined. # Per-app se mode is designed for deploying dedicated load balancers per app (vs).,In this mode, each se is limited to a max of 2 vss.,Vcpus in per-app ses count towards licensing usage at 25% rate.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

vcenter_datastores_include: not required, default: undefined. # Boolean flag to set vcenter_datastores_include.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).

se_vs_hb_max_pkts_in_batch: not required, default: undefined. # Maximum number of aggregated vs heartbeat packets to send in a batch.,Allowed values are 1-256.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 8.
name: required, default: undefined. # Name of the object.
tenant_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type tenant.

host_attribute_key: not required, default: undefined. # Key of a (key, value) pair identifying a label for a set of nodes usually in container clouds.,Needs to be specified together with host_attribute_value.,Ses can be configured differently including ha modes across different se groups.,May also be used for isolation between different classes of virtualservices.,Virtualservices' se group may be specified via annotations/labels.,A openshift/kubernetes namespace maybe annotated with a matching se group label as openshift.io/node-selector  apptype=prod.,When multiple se groups are used in a cloud with host attributes specified,just a single se group can exist as a match-all se group without a,host_attribute_key.
url: not required, default: undefined. # Avi controller URL of the object.

max_se: not required, default: undefined. # Maximum number of services engines in this group.,Allowed values are 0-1000.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 10.
hypervisor: not required, default: undefined. # Override default hypervisor.,Enum options - DEFAULT, VMWARE_ESX, KVM, VMWARE_VSAN, XEN.
cpu_reserve: not required, default: undefined. # Boolean flag to set cpu_reserve.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
se_dos_profile: not required, default: undefined. # Dosthresholdprofile settings for serviceenginegroup.

enable_vmac: not required, default: undefined. # Use virtual mac address for interfaces on which floating interface ips are placed.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
iptables: not required, default: undefined. # Iptable rules.

udf_log_throttle: not required, default: undefined. # This setting limits the number of udf logs generated per second per core on this se.,Udf logs are generated due to the configured client log filters or the rules with logging enabled.,Default is 100 logs per second.,Set it to zero (0) to disable throttling.,Field introduced in 17.1.3.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 100.
vcenter_hosts: not required, default: undefined. # Vcenterhosts settings for serviceenginegroup.

se_ipc_udp_port: not required, default: undefined. # Udp port for se_dp ipc in docker bridge mode.,Field introduced in 17.1.2.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1500.

vcpus_per_se: not required, default: undefined. # Number of vcpus for each of the service engine virtual machines.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.

hm_on_standby: not required, default: undefined. # Enable active health monitoring from the standby se for all placed virtual services.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.

disk_per_se: not required, default: undefined. # Amount of disk space for each of the service engine virtual machines.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 10.

cpu_socket_affinity: not required, default: undefined. # Allocate all the cpu cores for the service engine virtual machines  on the same cpu socket.,Applicable only for vcenter cloud.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
realtime_se_metrics: not required, default: undefined. # Enable or disable real time se metrics.

archive_shm_limit: not required, default: undefined. # Amount of se memory in gb until which shared memory is collected in core archive.,Field introduced in 17.1.3.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 8.
hardwaresecuritymodulegroup_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type hardwaresecuritymodulegroup.
custom_securitygroups_mgmt: not required, default: undefined. # Custom security groups to be associated with management vnic for se instances in openstack and aws clouds.,Field introduced in 17.1.3.
custom_tag: not required, default: undefined. # Custom tag will be used to create the tags for se instance in aws.,Note this is not the same as the prefix for se name.

floating_intf_ip_se_2: not required, default: undefined. # If serviceenginegroup is configured for legacy 1+1 active standby ha mode, floating ip's will be advertised only by the active se in the pair.,Virtual services in this group must be disabled/enabled for any changes to the floating ip's to take effect.,Only active se hosting vs tagged with active standby se 2 tag will advertise this floating ip when manual load distribution is enabled.

log_disksz: not required, default: undefined. # Maximum disk capacity (in mb) to be allocated to an se.,This is exclusively used for debug and log data.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 10000.

non_significant_log_throttle: not required, default: undefined. # This setting limits the number of non-significant logs generated per second per core on this se.,Default is 100 logs per second.,Set it to zero (0) to disable throttling.,Field introduced in 17.1.3.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 100.

distribute_load_active_standby: not required, default: undefined. # Use both the active and standby service engines for virtual service placement in the legacy active standby ha mode.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
cloud_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type cloud.

extra_shared_config_memory: not required, default: undefined. # Extra config memory to support large geo db configuration.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.

auto_rebalance_interval: not required, default: undefined. # Frequency of rebalance, if 'auto rebalance' is enabled.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 300.
buffer_se: not required, default: undefined. # Excess service engine capacity provisioned for ha failover.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.
vcenter_datastores: not required, default: undefined. # List of vcenterdatastore.
state: not required, default: present. # The state that should be applied on the entity.

vs_scaleout_timeout: not required, default: undefined. # Time to wait for the scaled out se to become ready before marking the scaleout done.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 30.
openstack_availability_zones: not required, default: undefined. # Field introduced in 17.1.1.
mgmt_network_ref: not required, default: undefined. # Management network to use for avi service engines.,It is a reference to an object of type network.

num_flow_cores_sum_changes_to_ignore: not required, default: undefined. # Number of changes in num flow cores sum to ignore.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 8.
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.

se_thread_multiplier: not required, default: undefined. # Multiplier for se threads based on vcpu.,Allowed values are 1-10.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.
openstack_mgmt_network_name: not required, default: undefined. # Avi management network name.

async_ssl_threads: not required, default: undefined. # Number of async ssl threads per se_dp.,Allowed values are 1-4.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.
description: not required, default: undefined. # User defined description for the object.
openstack_mgmt_network_uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Management network uuid.

vcenter_folder: not required, default: undefined. # Folder to place all the service engine virtual machines in vcenter.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as AviSeFolder.

vs_scalein_timeout_for_upgrade: not required, default: undefined. # During se upgrade, time to wait for the scaled-in se to drain existing flows before marking the scalein done.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 30.

se_deprovision_delay: not required, default: undefined. # Duration to preserve unused service engine virtual machines before deleting them.,If traffic to a virtual service were to spike up abruptly, this se would still be available to be utilized again rather than creating a new se.,If this value is set to 0, controller will never delete any ses and administrator has to manually cleanup unused ses.,Allowed values are 0-525600.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 120.

se_vs_hb_max_vs_in_pkt: not required, default: undefined. # Maximum number of virtualservices for which heartbeat messages are aggregated in one packet.,Allowed values are 1-1024.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 256.

advertise_backend_networks: not required, default: undefined. # Advertise reach-ability of backend server networks via adc through bgp for default gateway feature.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

memory_per_se: not required, default: undefined. # Amount of memory for each of the service engine virtual machines.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 2048.

max_cpu_usage: not required, default: undefined. # When cpu usage on an se exceeds this threshold, virtual services hosted on this se may be rebalanced to other ses to reduce load.,A new se may be created as part of this process.,Allowed values are 40-90.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 80.

min_scaleout_per_vs: not required, default: undefined. # Minimum number of active service engines for the virtual service.,Allowed values are 1-64.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.

se_name_prefix: not required, default: undefined. # Prefix to use for virtual machine name of service engines.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as Avi.
mem_reserve: not required, default: undefined. # Boolean flag to set mem_reserve.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.

ha_mode: not required, default: undefined. # High availability mode for all the virtual services using this service engine group.,Enum options - HA_MODE_SHARED_PAIR, HA_MODE_SHARED, HA_MODE_LEGACY_ACTIVE_STANDBY.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as HA_MODE_SHARED.

vcenter_datastore_mode: not required, default: undefined. # Enum options - vcenter_datastore_any, vcenter_datastore_local, vcenter_datastore_shared.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as VCENTER_DATASTORE_ANY.
openstack_availability_zone: not required, default: undefined. # Field deprecated in 17.1.1.
least_load_core_selection: not required, default: undefined. # Select core with least load for new flow.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.

aggressive_failure_detection: not required, default: undefined. # Enable aggressive failover configuration for ha.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

significant_log_throttle: not required, default: undefined. # This setting limits the number of significant logs generated per second per core on this se.,Default is 100 logs per second.,Set it to zero (0) to disable throttling.,Field introduced in 17.1.3.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 100.

dedicated_dispatcher_core: not required, default: undefined. # Dedicate the core that handles packet receive/transmit from the network to just the dispatching function.,Don't use it for tcp/ip and ssl functions.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

algo: not required, default: undefined. # In compact placement, virtual services are placed on existing ses until max_vs_per_se limit is reached.,Enum options - PLACEMENT_ALGO_PACKED, PLACEMENT_ALGO_DISTRIBUTED.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as PLACEMENT_ALGO_PACKED.

vs_host_redundancy: not required, default: undefined. # Ensure primary and secondary service engines are deployed on different physical hosts.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.

avi_snmptrapprofile.description: Module for setup of SnmpTrapProfile Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_snmptrapprofile
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
name: required, default: undefined. # A user-friendly name of the snmp trap configuration.
url: not required, default: undefined. # Avi controller URL of the object.
tenant_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
state: not required, default: present. # The state that should be applied on the entity.
trap_servers: not required, default: undefined. # The ip address or hostname of the snmp trap destination server.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Uuid of the snmp trap profile object.

avi_sslkeyandcertificate.description: Module for setup of SSLKeyAndCertificate Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_sslkeyandcertificate
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

status: not required, default: undefined. # Enum options - ssl_certificate_finished, ssl_certificate_pending.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as SSL_CERTIFICATE_FINISHED.
certificate_management_profile_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type certificatemanagementprofile.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
key: not required, default: undefined. # Private key.
key_params: not required, default: undefined. # Sslkeyparams settings for sslkeyandcertificate.
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Unique object identifier of the object.
enckey_base64: not required, default: undefined. # Encrypted private key corresponding to the private key (e.g.,Those generated by an hsm such as thales nshield).
name: required, default: undefined. # Name of the object.
dynamic_params: not required, default: undefined. # Dynamic parameters needed for certificate management profile.
url: not required, default: undefined. # Avi controller URL of the object.
enckey_name: not required, default: undefined. # Name of the encrypted private key (e.g.,Those generated by an hsm such as thales nshield).
tenant_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
hardwaresecuritymodulegroup_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type hardwaresecuritymodulegroup.
created_by: not required, default: undefined. # Creator name.
state: not required, default: present. # The state that should be applied on the entity.
certificate: required, default: undefined. # Sslcertificate settings for sslkeyandcertificate.
ca_certs: not required, default: undefined. # Ca certificates in certificate chain.

type: not required, default: undefined. # Enum options - ssl_certificate_type_virtualservice, ssl_certificate_type_system, ssl_certificate_type_ca.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as SSL_CERTIFICATE_TYPE_VIRTUALSERVICE.
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.

avi_sslprofile.description: Module for setup of SSLProfile Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_sslprofile
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

accepted_ciphers: not required, default: undefined. # Ciphers suites represented as defined by U(http://www.openssl.org/docs/apps/ciphers.html).,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as AES:3DES:RC4.

prefer_client_cipher_ordering: not required, default: undefined. # Prefer the ssl cipher ordering presented by the client during the ssl handshake over the one specified in the ssl profile.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
description: not required, default: undefined. # User defined description for the object.
tags: not required, default: undefined. # List of tag.
accepted_versions: not required, default: undefined. # Set of versions accepted by the server.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Unique object identifier of the object.
ssl_session_timeout: not required, default: undefined. # The amount of time before an ssl session expires.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 86400.
name: required, default: undefined. # Name of the object.
url: not required, default: undefined. # Avi controller URL of the object.
tenant_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type tenant.

cipher_enums: not required, default: undefined. # Enum options - tls_ecdhe_ecdsa_with_aes_128_gcm_sha256, tls_ecdhe_ecdsa_with_aes_256_gcm_sha384, tls_ecdhe_rsa_with_aes_128_gcm_sha256,,tls_ecdhe_rsa_with_aes_256_gcm_sha384, tls_ecdhe_ecdsa_with_aes_128_cbc_sha256, tls_ecdhe_ecdsa_with_aes_256_cbc_sha384,,tls_ecdhe_rsa_with_aes_128_cbc_sha256, tls_ecdhe_rsa_with_aes_256_cbc_sha384, tls_rsa_with_aes_128_gcm_sha256, tls_rsa_with_aes_256_gcm_sha384,,tls_rsa_with_aes_128_cbc_sha256, tls_rsa_with_aes_256_cbc_sha256, tls_ecdhe_ecdsa_with_aes_128_cbc_sha, tls_ecdhe_ecdsa_with_aes_256_cbc_sha,,tls_ecdhe_rsa_with_aes_128_cbc_sha, tls_ecdhe_rsa_with_aes_256_cbc_sha, tls_rsa_with_aes_128_cbc_sha, tls_rsa_with_aes_256_cbc_sha,,tls_rsa_with_3des_ede_cbc_sha, tls_rsa_with_rc4_128_sha.
enable_ssl_session_reuse: not required, default: undefined. # Enable ssl session re-use.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.
state: not required, default: present. # The state that should be applied on the entity.

send_close_notify: not required, default: undefined. # Send 'close notify' alert message for a clean shutdown of the ssl connection.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.
dhparam: not required, default: undefined. # Dh parameters used in ssl.,At this time, it is not configurable and is set to 2048 bits.
ssl_rating: not required, default: undefined. # Sslrating settings for sslprofile.
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.

avi_stringgroup.description: Module for setup of StringGroup Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_stringgroup
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Uuid of the string group.
description: not required, default: undefined. # User defined description for the object.
url: not required, default: undefined. # Avi controller URL of the object.

type: required, default: undefined. # Type of stringgroup.,Enum options - SG_TYPE_STRING, SG_TYPE_KEYVAL.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as SG_TYPE_STRING.
tenant_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
state: not required, default: present. # The state that should be applied on the entity.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
kv: not required, default: undefined. # Configure key value in the string group.
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
name: required, default: undefined. # Name of the string group.

avi_systemconfiguration.description: Module for setup of SystemConfiguration Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_systemconfiguration
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
docker_mode: not required, default: undefined. # Boolean flag to set docker_mode.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
dns_configuration: not required, default: undefined. # Dnsconfiguration settings for systemconfiguration.
proxy_configuration: not required, default: undefined. # Proxyconfiguration settings for systemconfiguration.

ssh_hmacs: not required, default: undefined. # Allowed hmac list for ssh to the management interface on the controller and service engines.,If this is not specified, all the default hmacs are allowed.,Ssh -q mac provides the list of default hmacs supported.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
portal_configuration: not required, default: undefined. # Portalconfiguration settings for systemconfiguration.
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
email_configuration: not required, default: undefined. # Emailconfiguration settings for systemconfiguration.
uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Unique object identifier of the object.
snmp_configuration: not required, default: undefined. # Snmpconfiguration settings for systemconfiguration.
url: not required, default: undefined. # Avi controller URL of the object.
linux_configuration: not required, default: undefined. # Linuxconfiguration settings for systemconfiguration.
global_tenant_config: not required, default: undefined. # Tenantconfiguration settings for systemconfiguration.

dns_virtualservice_refs: not required, default: undefined. # Dns virtualservices hosting fqdn records for applications across avi vantage.,If no virtualservices are provided, avi vantage will provide dns services for configured applications.,Switching back to avi vantage from dns virtualservices is not allowed.,It is a reference to an object of type virtualservice.
state: not required, default: present. # The state that should be applied on the entity.
ntp_configuration: not required, default: undefined. # Ntpconfiguration settings for systemconfiguration.
admin_auth_configuration: not required, default: undefined. # Adminauthconfiguration settings for systemconfiguration.
mgmt_ip_access_control: not required, default: undefined. # Configure ip access control for controller to restrict open access.

ssh_ciphers: not required, default: undefined. # Allowed ciphers list for ssh to the management interface on the controller and service engines.,If this is not specified, all the default ciphers are allowed.,Ssh -q cipher provides the list of default ciphers supported.
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.

avi_tenant.description: Module for setup of Tenant Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_tenant
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
name: required, default: undefined. # Name of the object.
url: not required, default: undefined. # Avi controller URL of the object.
description: not required, default: undefined. # User defined description for the object.
state: not required, default: present. # The state that should be applied on the entity.
created_by: not required, default: undefined. # Creator of this tenant.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
config_settings: not required, default: undefined. # Tenantconfiguration settings for tenant.
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
local: not required, default: undefined. # Boolean flag to set local.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Unique object identifier of the object.

avi_trafficcloneprofile.description: Module for setup of TrafficCloneProfile Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_trafficcloneprofile
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Uuid of the traffic clone profile.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.
name: required, default: undefined. # Name for the traffic clone profile.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.
cloud_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type cloud.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.
tenant_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type tenant.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.
state: not required, default: present. # The state that should be applied on the entity.
url: not required, default: undefined. # Avi controller URL of the object.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).

preserve_client_ip: not required, default: undefined. # Specifies if client ip needs to be preserved to clone destination.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
clone_servers: not required, default: undefined. # Field introduced in 17.1.1.

avi_useraccountprofile.description: Module for setup of UserAccountProfile Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_useraccountprofile
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

max_concurrent_sessions: not required, default: undefined. # Maximum number of concurrent sessions allowed.,There are unlimited sessions by default.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.
uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Unique object identifier of the object.
state: not required, default: present. # The state that should be applied on the entity.
url: not required, default: undefined. # Avi controller URL of the object.

account_lock_timeout: not required, default: undefined. # Lock timeout period (in minutes).,Default is 30 minutes.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 30.
name: required, default: undefined. # Name of the object.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).

max_login_failure_count: not required, default: undefined. # Number of login attempts before lockout.,Default is 3 attempts.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 3.
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.

max_password_history_count: not required, default: undefined. # Maximum number of passwords to be maintained in the password history.,Default is 4 passwords.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 4.
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

credentials_timeout_threshold: not required, default: undefined. # The time period after which credentials expire.,Default is 180 days.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 180.

avi_virtualservice.description: Module for setup of VirtualService Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_virtualservice
client_auth: not required, default: undefined. # Http authentication configuration for protected resources.
port_uuid: not required, default: undefined. # (internal-use) network port assigned to the virtual service ip address.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.
availability_zone: not required, default: undefined. # Availability-zone to place the virtual service.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.

flow_dist: not required, default: undefined. # Criteria for flow distribution among ses.,Enum options - LOAD_AWARE, CONSISTENT_HASH_SOURCE_IP_ADDRESS, CONSISTENT_HASH_SOURCE_IP_ADDRESS_AND_PORT.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as LOAD_AWARE.

floating_subnet_uuid: not required, default: undefined. # If auto_allocate_floating_ip is true and more than one floating-ip subnets exist, then the subnet for the floating ip address allocation.,This field is applicable only if the virtualservice belongs to an openstack or aws cloud.,In openstack or aws cloud it is required when auto_allocate_floating_ip is selected.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.

delay_fairness: not required, default: undefined. # Select the algorithm for qos fairness.,This determines how multiple virtual services sharing the same service engines will prioritize traffic over a congested network.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
vip: not required, default: undefined. # List of virtual service ips.,While creating a 'shared vs',please use vsvip_ref to point to the shared entities.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.
snat_ip: not required, default: undefined. # Nat'ted floating source ip address(es) for upstream connection to servers.
enable_rhi_snat: not required, default: undefined. # Enable route health injection for source nat'ted floating ip address using the bgp config in the vrf context.
sideband_profile: not required, default: undefined. # Sideband configuration to be used for this virtualservice.it can be used for sending traffic to sideband vips for external inspection etc.
requests_rate_limit: not required, default: undefined. # Rate limit the incoming requests to this virtual service.
analytics_profile_ref: not required, default: undefined. # Specifies settings related to analytics.,It is a reference to an object of type analyticsprofile.
uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Uuid of the virtualservice.

discovered_subnet: not required, default: undefined. # (internal-use) discovered subnets providing reachability for client facing virtual service ip.,This field is deprecated.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.

pool_ref: not required, default: undefined. # The pool is an object that contains destination servers and related attributes such as load-balancing and persistence.,It is a reference to an object of type pool.
ssl_profile_ref: not required, default: undefined. # Determines the set of ssl versions and ciphers to accept for ssl/tls terminated connections.,It is a reference to an object of type sslprofile.
created_by: not required, default: undefined. # Creator name.

ign_pool_net_reach: not required, default: undefined. # Ignore pool servers network reachability constraints for virtual service placement.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

max_cps_per_client: not required, default: undefined. # Maximum connections per second per client ip.,Allowed values are 10-1000.,Special values are 0- 'unlimited'.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.

ssl_sess_cache_avg_size: not required, default: undefined. # Expected number of ssl session cache entries (may be exceeded).,Allowed values are 1024-16383.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1024.
vs_datascripts: not required, default: undefined. # Datascripts applied on the data traffic of the virtual service.
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
network_security_policy_ref: not required, default: undefined. # Network security policies for the virtual service.,It is a reference to an object of type networksecuritypolicy.
http_policies: not required, default: undefined. # Http policies applied on the data traffic of the virtual service.
application_profile_ref: not required, default: undefined. # Enable application layer specific features for the virtual service.,It is a reference to an object of type applicationprofile.
microservice_ref: not required, default: undefined. # Microservice representing the virtual service.,It is a reference to an object of type microservice.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
ip_address: not required, default: undefined. # Ip address of the virtual service.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.
pool_group_ref: not required, default: undefined. # The pool group is an object that contains pools.,It is a reference to an object of type poolgroup.

east_west_placement: not required, default: undefined. # Force placement on all se's in service group (mesos mode only).,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

subnet_uuid: not required, default: undefined. # It represents subnet for the virtual service ip address allocation when auto_allocate_ip is true.it is only applicable in openstack or aws cloud.,This field is required if auto_allocate_ip is true.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.
name: required, default: undefined. # Name for the virtual service.
service_pool_select: not required, default: undefined. # Select pool based on destination port.

type: not required, default: undefined. # Specify if this is a normal virtual service, or if it is the parent or child of an sni-enabled virtual hosted virtual service.,Enum options - VS_TYPE_NORMAL, VS_TYPE_VH_PARENT, VS_TYPE_VH_CHILD.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as VS_TYPE_NORMAL.

enable_autogw: not required, default: undefined. # Response traffic to clients will be sent back to the source mac address of the connection, rather than statically sent to a default gateway.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.

discovered_networks: not required, default: undefined. # (internal-use) discovered networks providing reachability for client facing virtual service ip.,This field is used internally by avi, not editable by the user.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.
enabled: not required, default: undefined. # Enable or disable the virtual service.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as True.
content_rewrite: not required, default: undefined. # Profile used to match and rewrite strings in request and/or response body.

ssl_key_and_certificate_refs: not required, default: undefined. # Select or create one or two certificates, ec and/or rsa, that will be presented to ssl/tls terminated connections.,It is a reference to an object of type sslkeyandcertificate.

static_dns_records: not required, default: undefined. # List of static dns records applied to this virtual service.,These are static entries and no health monitoring is performed against the ip addresses.
analytics_policy: not required, default: undefined. # Determines analytics settings for the application.
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

network_profile_ref: not required, default: undefined. # Determines network settings such as protocol, tcp or udp, and related options for the protocol.,It is a reference to an object of type networkprofile.

auto_allocate_ip: not required, default: undefined. # Auto-allocate vip from the provided subnet.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

weight: not required, default: undefined. # The quality of service weight to assign to traffic transmitted from this virtual service.,A higher weight will prioritize traffic versus other virtual services sharing the same service engines.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 1.
tenant_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
ipam_network_subnet: not required, default: undefined. # Subnet and/or network for allocating virtualservice ip by ipam provider module.

traffic_clone_profile_ref: not required, default: undefined. # Server network or list of servers for cloning traffic.,It is a reference to an object of type trafficcloneprofile.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.

avi_allocated_vip: not required, default: undefined. # (internal-use) vip allocated by avi in the cloud infrastructure.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.

dns_info: not required, default: undefined. # Service discovery specific data including fully qualified domain name, type and time-to-live of the dns record.,Note that only one of fqdn and dns_info setting is allowed.

service_metadata: not required, default: undefined. # Metadata pertaining to the service provided by this virtual service.,In openshift/kubernetes environments, egress pod info is stored.,Any user input to this field will be overwritten by avi vantage.

vsvip_ref: not required, default: undefined. # Mostly used during the creation of shared vs, this fieldrefers to entities that can be shared across virtual services.,It is a reference to an object of type vsvip.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.
subnet: not required, default: undefined. # Subnet providing reachability for client facing virtual service ip.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.

vrf_context_ref: not required, default: undefined. # Virtual routing context that the virtual service is bound to.,This is used to provide the isolation of the set of networks the application is attached to.,It is a reference to an object of type vrfcontext.

cloud_type: not required, default: undefined. # Enum options - cloud_none, cloud_vcenter, cloud_openstack, cloud_aws, cloud_vca, cloud_apic, cloud_mesos, cloud_linuxserver, cloud_docker_ucp,,cloud_rancher, cloud_oshift_k8s.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as CLOUD_NONE.

vh_domain_name: not required, default: undefined. # The exact name requested from the client's sni-enabled tls hello domain name field.,If this is a match, the parent vs will forward the connection to this child vs.
cloud_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type cloud.
enable_rhi: not required, default: undefined. # Enable route health injection using the bgp config in the vrf context.

se_group_ref: not required, default: undefined. # The service engine group to use for this virtual service.,Moving to a new se group is disruptive to existing connections for this vs.,It is a reference to an object of type serviceenginegroup.

scaleout_ecmp: not required, default: undefined. # Disable re-distribution of flows across service engines for a virtual service.,Enable if the network itself performs flow hashing with ecmp in environments such as gcp.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
state: not required, default: present. # The state that should be applied on the entity.
nsx_securitygroup: not required, default: undefined. # A list of nsx service groups representing the clients which can access the virtual ip of the virtual service.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.

remove_listening_port_on_vs_down: not required, default: undefined. # Remove listening port if virtualservice is down.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
description: not required, default: undefined. # User defined description for the object.
performance_limits: not required, default: undefined. # Optional settings that determine performance limits like max connections or bandwdith etc.

use_bridge_ip_as_vip: not required, default: undefined. # Use bridge ip as vip on each host in mesos deployments.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
floating_ip: not required, default: undefined. # Floating ip to associate with this virtual service.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.

auto_allocate_floating_ip: not required, default: undefined. # Auto-allocate floating/elastic ip from the cloud infrastructure.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
host_name_xlate: not required, default: undefined. # Translate the host name sent to the servers to this value.,Translate the host name sent from servers back to the value used by the client.
services: not required, default: undefined. # List of services defined for this virtual service.
connections_rate_limit: not required, default: undefined. # Rate limit the incoming connections to this virtual service.

active_standby_se_tag: not required, default: undefined. # This configuration only applies if the virtualservice is in legacy active standby ha mode and load distribution among active standby is enabled.,This field is used to tag the virtualservice so that virtualservices with the same tag will share the same active serviceengine.,Virtualservices with different tags will have different active serviceengines.,If one of the serviceengine's in the serviceenginegroup fails, all virtualservices will end up using the same active serviceengine.,Redistribution of the virtualservices can be either manual or automated when the failed serviceengine recovers.,Redistribution is based on the auto redistribute property of the serviceenginegroup.,Enum options - ACTIVE_STANDBY_SE_1, ACTIVE_STANDBY_SE_2.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as ACTIVE_STANDBY_SE_1.

server_network_profile_ref: not required, default: undefined. # Determines the network settings profile for the server side of tcp proxied connections.,Leave blank to use the same settings as the client to vs side of the connection.,It is a reference to an object of type networkprofile.

discovered_network_ref: not required, default: undefined. # (internal-use) discovered networks providing reachability for client facing virtual service ip.,This field is deprecated.,It is a reference to an object of type network.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

limit_doser: not required, default: undefined. # Limit potential dos attackers who exceed max_cps_per_client significantly to a fraction of max_cps_per_client for a while.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
url: not required, default: undefined. # Avi controller URL of the object.
network_ref: not required, default: undefined. # Manually override the network on which the virtual service is placed.,It is a reference to an object of type network.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.
fqdn: not required, default: undefined. # Dns resolvable, fully qualified domain name of the virtualservice.,Only one of 'fqdn' and 'dns_info' configuration is allowed.

flow_label_type: not required, default: undefined. # Criteria for flow labelling.,Enum options - NO_LABEL, SERVICE_LABEL.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as NO_LABEL.
dns_policies: not required, default: undefined. # Dns policies applied on the dns traffic of the virtual service.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.
cloud_config_cksum: not required, default: undefined. # Checksum of cloud configuration for vs.,Internally set by cloud connector.

avi_allocated_fip: not required, default: undefined. # (internal-use) fip allocated by avi in the cloud infrastructure.,Field deprecated in 17.1.1.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
vh_parent_vs_uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Specifies the virtual service acting as virtual hosting (sni) parent.

avi_vrfcontext.description: Module for setup of VrfContext Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_vrfcontext
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
description: not required, default: undefined. # User defined description for the object.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).
system_default: not required, default: undefined. # Boolean flag to set system_default.,Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as False.
password: not required, default: undefined. # Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).
tenant: not required, default: admin. # Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
internal_gateway_monitor: not required, default: undefined. # Configure ping based heartbeat check for all default gateways in service engines of vrf.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.
name: required, default: undefined. # Name of the object.
static_routes: not required, default: undefined. # List of staticroute.
cloud_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type cloud.
tenant_ref: not required, default: undefined. # It is a reference to an object of type tenant.
uuid: not required, default: undefined. # Unique object identifier of the object.
debugvrfcontext: not required, default: undefined. # Configure debug flags for vrf.,Field introduced in 17.1.1.
url: not required, default: undefined. # Avi controller URL of the object.
state: not required, default: present. # The state that should be applied on the entity.
bgp_profile: not required, default: undefined. # Bgp local and peer info.
gateway_mon: not required, default: undefined. # Configure ping based heartbeat check for gateway in service engines of vrf.
tenant_uuid: not required, default: . # UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.
api_version: not required, default: undefined. # Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.

avi_vsdatascriptset.description: Module for setup of VSDataScriptSet Avi RESTful Object
body: avi_vsdatascriptset
username: not required, default: undefined. # Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).
description: not required, default: undefined. # User defined description for the object.
pool_refs: not required, default: undefined. # Uuid of pools that could be referred by vsdatascriptset objects.,It is a reference to an object of type pool.
pool_group_refs: not required, default: undefined. # Uuid of pool groups that could be referred by vsdatascriptset objects.,It is a reference to an object of type poolgroup.
string_group_refs: not required, default: undefined. # Uuid of string groups that could be referred by vsdatascriptset objects.,It is a reference to an object of type stringgroup.
controller: not required, default: undefined. # IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).

aws_direct_connect_connection.description: Creates, deletes, modifies a DirectConnect connection
body: aws_direct_connect_connection
bandwidth: not required, default: undefined. # The bandwidth of the Direct Connect connection. Required when I(state=present).

name: not required, default: undefined. # The name of the Direct Connect connection. This is required to create a new connection. To recreate or delete a connection I(name) or I(connection_id) is required.

link_aggregation_group: not required, default: undefined. # The ID of the link aggregation group you want to associate with the connection. This is optional in case a stand-alone connection is desired.
state: not required, default: undefined. # The state of the Direct Connect connection.

force_update: not required, default: undefined. # To modify bandwidth or location the connection will need to be deleted and recreated. By default this will not happen - this option must be set to True.

connection_id: not required, default: undefined. # The ID of the Direct Connect connection. I(name) or I(connection_id) is required to recreate or delete a connection. Modifying attributes of a connection with I(force_update) will result in a new Direct Connect connection ID.
location: not required, default: undefined. # Where the Direct Connect connection is located. Required when I(state=present).
aws_direct_connect_link_aggregation_group
name: not required, default: undefined. # The name of the Direct Connect link aggregation group.
state: not required, default: undefined. # The state of the Direct Connect link aggregation group.
delete_with_disassociation: not required, default: undefined. # To be used with I(state=absent) to delete connections after disassociating them with the LAG.

force_delete: not required, default: undefined. # This allows the minimum number of links to be set to 0, any hosted connections disassociated, and any virtual interfaces associated to the LAG deleted.
num_connections: not required, default: undefined. # The number of connections with which to intialize the link aggregation group.
connection_id: not required, default: undefined. # A connection ID to link with the link aggregation group upon creation.
bandwidth: not required, default: undefined. # The bandwidth of the link aggregation group.
wait_timeout: not required, default: 120. # The duration in seconds to wait if I(wait) is True.
location: not required, default: undefined. # The location of the link aggregation group.
min_links: not required, default: undefined. # The minimum number of physical connections that must be operational for the LAG itself to be operational.
link_aggregation_group_id: not required, default: undefined. # The ID of the Direct Connect link aggregation group.

wait: not required, default: undefined. # Whether or not to wait for the operation to complete. May be useful when waiting for virtual interfaces to be deleted. May modify the time of waiting with C(wait_timeout).

grant_types: not required, default: undefined. # List of grants to give to user/role. Likely "role,role grant" or "role,role grant,admin". Required when C(mode=grant).
role_name: not required, default: undefined. # Role to allow/deny access. One of C(role_name) or C(role_arn) are required.
mode: required, default: grant. # Grant or deny access.

ec2_url: not required, default: null. # Url to use to connect to EC2 or your Eucalyptus cloud (by default the module will use EC2 endpoints). Ignored for modules where region is required. Must be specified for all other modules if region is not used. If not set then the value of the EC2_URL environment variable, if any, is used.

profile: not required, default: null. # Uses a boto profile. Only works with boto >= 2.24.0.

permission: not required, default: private. # This option lets the user set the canned permissions on the object/bucket that are created. The permissions that can be set are 'private', 'public-read', 'public-read-write', 'authenticated-read' for a bucket or 'private', 'public-read', 'public-read-write', 'aws-exec-read', 'authenticated-read', 'bucket-owner-read', 'bucket-owner-full-control' for an object. Multiple permissions can be specified as a list.
dest: not required, default: undefined. # The destination file path when downloading an object/key with a GET operation.
max_keys: not required, default: 1000. # Max number of results to return in list mode, set this if you want to retrieve fewer than the default 1000 keys.
object: not required, default: undefined. # Keyname of the object inside the bucket. Can be used to create "virtual directories", see examples.

mode: required, default: undefined. # Switches the module behaviour between put (upload), get (download), geturl (return download url, Ansible 1.3+), getstr (download object as string (1.3+)), list (list keys, Ansible 2.0+), create (bucket), delete (bucket), and delobj (delete object, Ansible 2.0+).
prefix: not required, default: . # Limits the response to keys that begin with the specified prefix for list mode

ec2_url: not required, default: null. # Url to use to connect to EC2 or your Eucalyptus cloud (by default the module will use EC2 endpoints). Ignored for modules where region is required. Must be specified for all other modules if region is not used. If not set then the value of the EC2_URL environment variable, if any, is used.
marker: not required, default: undefined. # Specifies the key to start with when using list mode. Object keys are returned in alphabetical order, starting with key after the marker in order.

ignore_nonexistent_bucket: not required, default: undefined. # Overrides initial bucket lookups in case bucket or iam policies are restrictive. Example: a user may have the GetObject permission but no other permissions. In this case using the option mode: get will fail without specifying ignore_nonexistent_bucket: True.

overwrite: not required, default: always. # Force overwrite either locally on the filesystem or remotely with the object/key. Used with PUT and GET operations. Boolean or one of [always, never, different], true is equal to 'always' and false is equal to 'never', new in 2.0

src: not required, default: undefined. # The source file path when performing a PUT operation.

encrypt: not required, default: true. # When set for PUT mode, asks for server-side encryption.
security_token: not required, default: null. # AWS STS security token. If not set then the value of the AWS_SECURITY_TOKEN or EC2_SECURITY_TOKEN environment variable is used.
rgw: not required, default: false. # Enable Ceph RGW S3 support. This option requires an explicit url via s3_url.

region: not required, default: undefined. # AWS region to create the bucket in. If not set then the value of the AWS_REGION and EC2_REGION environment variables are checked, followed by the aws_region and ec2_region settings in the Boto config file. If none of those are set the region defaults to the S3 Location: US Standard. Prior to ansible 1.8 this parameter could be specified but had no effect.
bucket: required, default: undefined. # Bucket name.

headers: not required, default: undefined. # Custom headers for PUT operation, as a dictionary of 'key=value' and 'key=value,key=value'.
version: not required, default: undefined. # Version ID of the object inside the bucket. Can be used to get a specific version of a file if versioning is enabled in the target bucket.

azure.description: create or terminate a virtual machine in azure
body: azure

role_size: not required, default: Small. # azure role size for the new virtual machine (e.g., Small, ExtraLarge, A6). You have to pay attention to the fact that instances of type G and DS are not available in all regions (locations). Make sure if you selected the size and type of instance available in your chosen location.
virtual_network_name: not required, default: null. # Name of virtual network.
image: required, default: null. # system image for creating the virtual machine (e.g., b39f27a8b8c64d52b05eac6a62ebad85__Ubuntu_DAILY_BUILD-precise-12_04_3-LTS-amd64-server-20131205-en-us-30GB)
wait_timeout_redirects: not required, default: 300. # how long before wait gives up for redirects, in seconds
wait_timeout: not required, default: 600. # how long before wait gives up, in seconds
user: not required, default: null. # the unix username for the new virtual machine.
auto_updates: not required, default: no. # Enable Auto Updates on Windows Machines
storage_account: required, default: undefined. # the azure storage account in which to store the data disks.
password: not required, default: null. # the unix password for the new virtual machine.
os_type: not required, default: linux. # The type of the os that is gettings provisioned
wait: not required, default: no. # wait for the instance to be in state 'running' before returning
name: required, default: null. # name of the virtual machine and associated cloud service.
management_cert_path: not required, default: null. # path to an azure management certificate associated with the subscription id. Overrides the AZURE_CERT_PATH environment variable.
hostname: not required, default: null. # hostname to write /etc/hostname. Defaults to <name>.cloudapp.net.

ssh_cert_path: not required, default: null. # path to an X509 certificate containing the public ssh key to install in the virtual machine. See http://www.windowsazure.com/en-us/manage/linux/tutorials/intro-to-linux/ for more details.,if this option is specified, password-based ssh authentication will be disabled.
state: not required, default: present. # create or terminate instances
location: required, default: null. # the azure location to use (e.g. 'East US')
subscription_id: not required, default: null. # azure subscription id. Overrides the AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID environment variable.
endpoints: not required, default: 22. # a comma-separated list of TCP ports to expose on the virtual machine (e.g., "22,80")
enable_winrm: not required, default: yes. # Enable winrm on Windows Machines

body: azure_rm_deployment

deployment_name: not required, default: ansible-arm. # The name of the deployment to be tracked in the resource group deployment history. Re-using a deployment name will overwrite the previous value in the resource group's deployment history.

parameters: not required, default: null. # A hash of all the required template variables for the deployment template. This parameter is mutually exclusive with 'parameters_link'. Either one of them is required if "state" parameter is "present".
wait_for_deployment_polling_period: not required, default: 10. # Time (in seconds) to wait between polls when waiting for deployment completion.

Override the default ports by providing a list of open ports.

location: not required, default: resource_group location. # Valid azure location. Defaults to location of the resource group.

public_ip_allocation_method: not required, default: Dynamic. # If a public_ip_address_name is not provided, a default public IP address will be created. The allocation method determines whether or not the public IP address assigned to the network interface is permanent.

private_ip_allocation_method: not required, default: Dynamic. # Specify whether or not the assigned IP address is permanent. NOTE: when creating a network interface specifying a value of 'Static' requires that a private_ip_address value be provided. You can update the allocation method to 'Static' after a dynamic private ip address has been assigned.

os_type: not required, default: Linux. # Determines any rules to be added to a default security group. When creating a network interface, if no security group name is provided, a default security group will be created. If the os_type is 'Windows', a rule will be added allowing RDP access. If the os_type is 'Linux', a rule allowing SSH access will be added.
